main event: A staff-sergeant observed a pear-shaped object with a tail that changed course and altitude radically at Moody AFB.
interesting points: The object was of moderate intensity and appeared as an intense glowing mass,Its size was approximately 1/3 of the moon's diameter,The object's color changed from white to orange to yellow during the sighting,It moved erratically and stopped and started without making any noise,The object disappeared to the west after about 4-5 minutes of observation.
